mapper.sql: id, c_id, tempValue, turbValue, tdsValue, docValue, chro_r, chro_g, chro_b, phValue, gps_lat, gps_long, savetime
mapper.select:
SELECT top 1 dbo.river_collector_data_info.id, dbo.river_collector_data_info.c_id, dbo.river_collector_data_info.tempValue, dbo.river_collector_data_info.turbValue, dbo.river_collector_data_info.tdsValue, dbo.river_collector_data_info.docValue, dbo.river_collector_data_info.chro_r, dbo.river_collector_data_info.chro_g, dbo.river_collector_data_info.chro_b, dbo.river_collector_data_info.phValue, dbo.river_collector_data_info.gps_lat, dbo.river_collector_data_info.gps_long, dbo.river_collector_data_info.savetime, dbo.river_threshold_info.c_id info_cid, dbo.river_threshold_info.tempMAX info_tempmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.tempMIN info_tempmin, dbo.river_threshold_info.turbMAX info_turbmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.turbMIN info_turbmin, dbo.river_threshold_info.tdsMAX info_tdsmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.tdsMIN info_tdsmin, dbo.river_threshold_info.docMAX info_docmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.docMIN info_docmin, dbo.river_threshold_info.chroRMAX info_chrormax, dbo.river_threshold_info.chroRMIN info_chrormin, dbo.river_threshold_info.chroGMAX info_chrogmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.chroGMIN info_chrogmin, dbo.river_threshold_info.chroBMAX info_chrobmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.chroBMIN info_chrobmin, dbo.river_threshold_info.phMAX info_phmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.phMIN info_phmin
FROM dbo.river_collector_data_info JOIN dbo.river_threshold_info ON dbo.river_collector_data_info.c_id = dbo.river_threshold_info.c_id where dbo.river_collector_data_info.c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY savetime DESC

SELECT dbo.river_collector_data_info.id, dbo.river_collector_data_info.c_id, dbo.river_collector_data_info.tempValue, dbo.river_collector_data_info.turbValue, dbo.river_collector_data_info.tdsValue, dbo.river_collector_data_info.docValue, dbo.river_collector_data_info.chro_r, dbo.river_collector_data_info.chro_g, dbo.river_collector_data_info.chro_b, dbo.river_collector_data_info.phValue, dbo.river_collector_data_info.gps_lat, dbo.river_collector_data_info.gps_long, dbo.river_collector_data_info.savetime, dbo.river_threshold_info.c_id info_cid, dbo.river_threshold_info.tempMAX info_tempmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.tempMIN info_tempmin, dbo.river_threshold_info.turbMAX info_turbmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.turbMIN info_turbmin, dbo.river_threshold_info.tdsMAX info_tdsmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.tdsMIN info_tdsmin, dbo.river_threshold_info.docMAX info_docmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.docMIN info_docmin, dbo.river_threshold_info.chroRMAX info_chrormax, dbo.river_threshold_info.chroRMIN info_chrormin, dbo.river_threshold_info.chroGMAX info_chrogmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.chroGMIN info_chrogmin, dbo.river_threshold_info.chroBMAX info_chrobmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.chroBMIN info_chrobmin, dbo.river_threshold_info.phMAX info_phmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.phMIN info_phmin
FROM dbo.river_collector_data_info JOIN dbo.river_threshold_info ON dbo.river_collector_data_info.c_id = dbo.river_threshold_info.c_id where dbo.river_collector_data_info.c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY savetime DESC

SELECT dbo.river_collector_data_info.id, dbo.river_collector_data_info.c_id, dbo.river_collector_data_info.tempValue, dbo.river_collector_data_info.turbValue, dbo.river_collector_data_info.tdsValue, dbo.river_collector_data_info.docValue, dbo.river_collector_data_info.chro_r, dbo.river_collector_data_info.chro_g, dbo.river_collector_data_info.chro_b, dbo.river_collector_data_info.phValue, dbo.river_collector_data_info.gps_lat, dbo.river_collector_data_info.gps_long, dbo.river_collector_data_info.savetime, dbo.river_threshold_info.c_id info_cid, dbo.river_threshold_info.tempMAX info_tempmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.tempMIN info_tempmin, dbo.river_threshold_info.turbMAX info_turbmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.turbMIN info_turbmin, dbo.river_threshold_info.tdsMAX info_tdsmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.tdsMIN info_tdsmin, dbo.river_threshold_info.docMAX info_docmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.docMIN info_docmin, dbo.river_threshold_info.chroRMAX info_chrormax, dbo.river_threshold_info.chroRMIN info_chrormin, dbo.river_threshold_info.chroGMAX info_chrogmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.chroGMIN info_chrogmin, dbo.river_threshold_info.chroBMAX info_chrobmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.chroBMIN info_chrobmin, dbo.river_threshold_info.phMAX info_phmax, dbo.river_threshold_info.phMIN info_phmin
FROM dbo.river_collector_data_info JOIN dbo.river_threshold_info ON dbo.river_collector_data_info.c_id = dbo.river_threshold_info.c_id where dbo.river_collector_data_info.c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and dbo.river_collector_data_info.savetime <= #{endTime} and dbo.river_collector_data_info.savetime >= #{startTime} ORDER BY savetime DESC
mapper.insert: insert into river_collector_data_info (id, c_id, tempValue, turbValue, tdsValue, docValue, chro_r, chro_g, chro_b, phValue, gps_lat, gps_long, savetime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tempvalue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{turbvalue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{tdsvalue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{docvalue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{chroR,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chroG,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chroB,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phvalue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{gpsLat,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{gpsLong,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{savetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update river_collector_data_info
c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tempValue = #{tempvalue,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
turbValue = #{turbvalue,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
tdsValue = #{tdsvalue,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
docValue = #{docvalue,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
chro_r = #{chroR,jdbcType=INTEGER},
chro_g = #{chroG,jdbcType=INTEGER},
chro_b = #{chroB,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phValue = #{phvalue,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
gps_lat = #{gpsLat,jdbcType=CHAR},
gps_long = #{gpsLong,jdbcType=CHAR},
savetime = #{savetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update river_collector_data_info set c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tempValue = #{tempvalue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, turbValue = #{turbvalue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, tdsValue = #{tdsvalue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, docValue = #{docvalue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, chro_r = #{chroR,jdbcType=INTEGER}, chro_g = #{chroG,jdbcType=INTEGER}, chro_b = #{chroB,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phValue = #{phvalue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, gps_lat = #{gpsLat,jdbcType=CHAR}, gps_long = #{gpsLong,jdbcType=CHAR}, savetime = #{savetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
